channel.name: SKY Racing AU
channel.title: Sky Racing 1 Raceday
channel.desc: Thoroughbreds from Scone, Sale, Ipswich, Horseshoe Indianapolis, Penn National, Northam; Greyhound Racing from Richmond Straight, Casino, Shepparton, Warragul, Warrnambool, Shepparton Extra, Q Straight, Mount Gambier, Cambridge; Harness Racing from Kilmore, Albion Park.
